alert.note: Alert for Logan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 6:08PM MDT until August 03 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 700 PM MDT. * At 608 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Pawnee Buttes, or 25 miles south of Kimball, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 555 PM MDT, an automated station recorded a gust of 64 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Westplains. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
